title: Pink Heart
description:
A plain pink heart, expected to be frequently used alongside other hearts. Used to represent love, friendship, and feelings of warmth, and the color pink.

For many years before its introduction in 2022, the plain pink heart was one of the world's most frequently requested emojis.

On several platforms, pink hearts are used in the design of other emojis. These emoji include: Sparkling Heart ğŸ’–, Two Hearts ğŸ’•, Growing Heart ğŸ’—, Beating Heart ğŸ’“, Revolving Heart ğŸ’, Heart with Arrow ğŸ’˜, Heart with Ribbon ğŸ’, and Kiss ğŸ’.
apple_vendor_description: The pink heart emoji on Apple devices radiates a soft, delicate blush, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading that gives it a plump, inviting appearance. Its smooth gradients and realistic lighting create a subtle sheen, making it feel almost tangible. This gentle hue, distinct in Apple's emoji library, is perfect for expressing tender affection, friendship, or a sweet, lighthearted sentiment in digital conversations.
